oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The /khu, or Bushman soup spoon. This is a brush of native manufacture, the stem of which is also used to scratch the fire together. By |han=kasso (L VIII.-1. 6083 and 6084). The |khu is made by the men who bind together the back hairs of the |gipp (Proteles, or aardwolf). There are also details about the springbok's 'paxwax', or |kuerri, in this account of the making of the soup spoon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |khu The or Bushman soup-spoon
